00040 #include <linux/list.h>
00041 
00042 #include "globals.h"
00043 
00044 /*****************************************************************************/
00045 
00048 struct ec_sdo_request {
00049     struct list_head list; 
00050     uint16_t index; 
00051     uint8_t subindex; 
00052     uint8_t *data; 
00053     size_t mem_size; 
00054     size_t data_size; 
00055     uint8_t complete_access; 
00056     uint32_t issue_timeout; 
00058     uint32_t response_timeout; 
00060     ec_direction_t dir; 
00063     ec_internal_request_state_t state; 
00064     unsigned long jiffies_start; 
00065     unsigned long jiffies_sent; 
00067     int errno; 
00068     uint32_t abort_code; 
00069 };
00070
